text: Ezɨ Pailat kamaghɨn me mɨgei, “Kamaghɨn, ia a inigh mangɨva uan Arazibagh isɨn a tuisɨgh.” Ezɨ Judaba kamaghɨn akam ikara, “E gumazir tam puram a mɨsueghtɨ an aremeghan kogham.”(18:31) Romɨn gavman Judabar Nguazim gatifa. Egha me amamangatɨzɨ, Judaba uari uan kotɨn aven bizitabar akɨram. Egha me Judabar kotiabar kamaghɨn anogoroke, me gumazitam bagh mɨkɨmtɨ, an aremeghan markiam. Arazir gumazim ter ighuvim gafuzɨ an aremeghamim, kar Rombar arazimra.
